name: InkCleaner
description:
This game was made for the ludum dare 42: "Running out of Space"

Try to avoid drowning in ink as Long as possible.

WASD/Arrows/Mouseclick - Move
Spacebar/Return/Click on Broom - Clean Ink around you
Spacebar/Click after game - Restart

You can collect gold by cleaning ink with gold stain or walking onto the golden ink puddles for twice the reward.
